title: Will APAC continue its dominance in the chitosan market? - Quora

response.answer_text: Consumers in North America and Europe are increasingly inclined towards natural ingredients given they are touted as safer, eco-friendly and healthier alternative to traditional cosmetics. Popularity of chitosan in hair care, dental care and skin care has been overwhelming in advanced economies. APAC appears to have ruled the roost in 2017 as the region amounted for more than 55% chitosan market share in 2017. In the wake of robustly growing cosmetic market and promotion of ease of doing business in India and China, stakeholders envisage APAC as a favorable investment hub. Meanwhile, MEA chitosan market is set to experience a bullish growth with CAGR nearing 19.5% through 2024. Rising initiatives taken by governments pertaining to water treatment technologies will potentially present positive chitosan market outlook. Besides, soaring popularity of food and beverage industry in MEA is set to fuel chitosan market trend.
